definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: Birds, such as the New Zealand kiwi, cannot fly.
sentences.chinese: 有的鳥，如新西蘭幾維鳥，也不會飛行。

sentences.english: Kiwis are found in New Zealand and are also often used as the symbol of the country.
sentences.chinese: 幾維鳥產於新西蘭，常被用作該國的象徵。

sentences.english: A kiwi is a grayish brown bird which is about as big as a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 幾維鳥是大小如雞的灰褐色的鳥。

sentences.english: There are several different species of kiwis, and some of them are endangered.
sentences.chinese: 幾維鳥分爲幾個不同的種類，有些種類已瀕臨滅絕。
